name: Vegan Falafel Casserole
author: Kacey Taylor
summary: You won't miss the meat with this flavorful casserole!
ingredients: sea salt and ground black pepper to taste
½ cup hummus, or as needed
2 tablespoons finely chopped roasted red peppers, finely chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine falafel mix and water in a small bowl until well mixed; spread evenly into the bottom of a casserole dish
Bake in the preheated oven until lightly browned, about 15 minutes
Blend yogurt, 1/2 sliced cucumber, and lemon juice in a a food processor until yogurt sauce is smooth
Spread hummus in an even layer over falafel crust
Arrange tomato slices on the hummus and top with cucumber slices
Cover cucumber layer with yogurt sauce
Sprinkle roasted red peppers and olives over yogurt sauce
